title: Daily reminder that solo q is not coming.

replies.body: Daily reminder that it's already on OCE.
Are duos allowed? Then it isn't solo queue. Call a horse a cow if you want, doesn't mean you can milk it.
People have always called Solo/Duo Queue just Solo Queue. Welcome to League.

We were also promised a true solo queue at the end of season 5. Welcome to Riot's promises.

Since apparently everyone here are sheeple with memory retention of goldfish:

>We also heard from some players who prefer to solely measure themselves against all comers. We’re sensitive to any large swath of players feeling like they’re losing their place in League and while we firmly believe in Dynamic Ranked as the future, the game’s social features don’t offer enough support for players looking for like-minded, similarly-skilled players today. Because of this, we’ll launch a new Solo Ranked Queue (no duo’s!) in the coming weeks. 
>
>http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/HGblb9fH-the-2016-ranked-season-updates-on-dynamic-ranked-and-your-feedback

Feel free to pretend we're getting what we asked for and were promised, but it isn't. But hey, they gotta keep the boosted primates happy, wouldn't want them to face the fact they wouldn't get ranks they have now by themselves. That's the way the merry go round turns around here.
That was Lyte, who jumped the gun on that and does not work for Riot anymore. They acknowledged this.

So? He was a Riot employe making an official Riot announcement. That he later decided to resign doesn't change anything.

 Dynamic queue was a response to people demanding a true solo queue. People were complaining about premade duos since ever. So at the end of season 5 they announced they were making a queue for premades (DQ) and solo queue would finally be just that. Then they said DQ would be the only queue around. Now they're bringing back the old duo queue as if that was what everyone wanted all along, which it isn't. This "raise taxes by 40% so you can later be thanked for lowering them 10%" tactic Riot is using is wrong. Feel free to buy into it though.
